articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Om Yong Chun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Om Yong Chun
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of the late People's Actress Om Yong Chun, room chief of the State National Art Troupe, on Tuesday, expressing deep condolences over her demise.

articles.title: Election of Deputies to 12th SPA to Be Held
articles.content:
Election of Deputies to 12th SPA to Be Held
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Tuesday promulgated its decision on holding the election of deputies to the SPA of the DPRK.
					According to the decision, the election of deputies to the 12th SPA will be held on March 8, Juche 98 (2009) according to Article 90 of the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK.

articles.title: What Is Massacre Aimed at
articles.content:
What Is Massacre Aimed at
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Israel is steadily escalating its brutal military attacks on Gaza Strip of Palestine, turning a deaf ear to the strong protest and condemnation of the international community.
					The operation started on December 27 last year with an air raid involving more than 60 fighters and armed helicopters and it entered a ground operation on January 3.
					
					Israeli ground force of three-brigade scale including tanks and infantry units broke into various areas of Gaza Strip on the night of January 3 to launch into a bloody operation of genocide and destruction.
					
					 The indiscriminate artillery and air strikes and other military actions of the Israeli forces had left 514 Palestinians dead and more than 2,600 wounded and reduced many public institutions and buildings to ruins in Gaza Strip by last Sunday.
					
					The spokesman for the Israeli army blared that the operation was aimed at destroying the infrastructure of Hamas, the Palestinian political and military organization controlling Gaza Strip.
					
					The reckless military action of Israel escalating the inhuman massacre of Palestinians from the beginning of the new year under the cloak of "anti-terrorism" is calling forth anger and denunciation against Israel and the United States worldwide.
					
					Arab and Islamic countries strongly demand that Israel promptly stop its military operation in Gaza Strip causing humanitarian disaster, saying it is immediately an attack on cities of all Arab countries and a criminal act destroying the Mid-east peace process.
					
					Demonstrations and rallies condemning Israel's acts of aggression and the unjustifiable Mid-east policy of the United States are sweeping Asia, Europe, Latin America and rest of the world, to say nothing of Mid-east.
					
					Noting that the criminal acts of the Israeli army resulted from the policy of the U.S. imperialists for gratifying their aggressive ambition on the Palestinian territory and Mid-east countries by manipulating Israel, the Bolivian President said the U.S. should abandon its despicable scheme to push its aggressive policy through its satellite forces like Israel.
					
					Entirely right is this voice of condemnation of the international community.
					
					Now the U.S. is defending Israel's acts of genocide, claiming that Israel has "the right to self-defense" and Hamas is "a terrorist organization".
					
					Vice-president of the U.S. Cheney in his radio interview on January 4 went the lengths of blabbing that the air-raid operation on Gaza Strip was not enough and Israel was right in deciding to launch into a ground operation.
					
					The U.S. already in September last year allowed Israel to purchase 1,000 GPS-guided missiles, called GBU-39, to be used in bombings on Gaza Strip. These missiles arrived in Israel in early December before the start of air strikes and they were the main means of strike in the air-raid, the first stage of the current military operation.
					
					With this patronage of the U.S., Israel tightened the blockade of Gaza Strip last year and killed armed personnel of Hamas on November 4, which forced Hamas to resume its rocket and mortar attacks on the northern area of Israel.
					
					This led to the total destruction of the truce which had been maintained, though perfunctorily, between Hamas and Israel from June 2008. Israel, as if it had been waiting for it, made it a pretext to carry its plan of massive military attacks on Gaza Strip into practice.
					
					Israel and the U.S. are pursuing several political and military purposes through the operation.
					
					A general election is slated in Israel on February 10. Yet the ruling Kadima Party appears disturbed over the scandal of the Prime Minister and the support rate to it is woefully low.
					
					The Israeli authorities seek to stave off the crisis within the party and boost its "popularity" through the military adventures at the expense of the Palestinians.
					
					From the military point of view, they regard the operation as an important chance of recovering from its miserable setback in the 2006 Lebanese War.
					
					The current operation may be called the second war by proxy to be provoked by the present U.S. administration in the Mid-east through Israel during its eight-year office.
					
					The Bush administration has tried by hook or by crook to turn the Mid-east peace process into an "anti-terrorism war" for establishing an order of its exclusive sway in the region, but to no avail.
					
					The U.S. is trying to cover up its defeat in its Mid-east policy by means of focusing the world's attention on the "terrorism" of Hamas and beating the drum of "anti-terrorism war" more loudly.
					
					It is not a mere accident that the U.S. is branding Hamas as a "terrorist organization" and justifying the military attacks on it, challenging the international opinion condemning the anti-human crimes of Israel.
					
					The aggressive and dominationist Mid-east policy of Israel and the U.S. which regard the Palestinians and the Mid-east peace process as a scapegoat on the altar of their political strategy will result in further isolating them in the international arena.

articles.title: Meeting Supports Palestinian People's Just Cause
articles.content:
Meeting Supports Palestinian People's Just Cause
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting for supporting the just cause of the Palestinian people took place here on Wednesday.
					Present at the meeting were Kim Pyong Phal, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea who is chairman of the DPRK-Palestine Friendship and Solidarity Committee, and officials concerned.
					
					There was a briefing on Israel's recent large-scale military attack on Palestine and its genocide.
					
					Then the meeting issued a statement of the above-said committee.
					
					The statement condemned the Israeli Zionists for persistently perpetrating large-scale barbaric attacks on the Gaza Strip of Palestine defying the international community's strong protest and denunciation.
					
					Recalling that many Palestinians lost their lives and their cradles were reduced to ashes, the statement bitterly denounced Israel's genocide as a crime against humanity, a serious provocation against the Arab people and an undisguised act of torpedoing the Mid-east peace process.
					
					It urged Israel to stop its rash actions and immediately halt all its military actions and respond to the demand of the Arab and other peoples of the world for a comprehensive and fair solution to the Mid-east issue.
					
					The DPRK-Palestine Friendship and Solidarity Committee will always extend full support and solidarity to the Palestinian people in their just cause of taking back the territories occupied by Israel and regaining the legitimate national rights including the right to self-determination, the right to return to their homeland and the right to build an independent state with Kuds as its capital, noted the statement.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Held to Vow to Fulfill Militant Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Held to Vow to Fulfill Militant Tasks for This Year
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in Jagang, South Hwanghae, Kangwon and Ryanggang provinces Tuesday to vow to implement the militant tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial in hearty response to the letter of the employees of the Chollima Steel Complex.
					Attending the rallies were leading officials of local party, power and economic organs and working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					Read out there was the letter of the employees of the complex addressed to all other working people across the country.
					
					Reporters and speakers said at the mass rallies that General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to the workers of the Chollima Steel Complex to kindle the torch for bringing about a new great revolutionary surge is stirring up the hearts of all the servicepersons and the people of the country all out in the advance in the new year and making the whole country seethe with the drive for creation and miracles.
					
					They renewed their determination to make a leap forward on all fronts through a great revolutionary surge by fully displaying great mental power augmented in the crucible of the Songun revolution.
					
					They called on the party members and all other working people to wage a high-pitched drive for bringing about a new great revolutionary surge across the country by fully displaying their mental power and thoroughly applying their own mode of struggle and creation and thus adorn a-hundred-year history of Kim Il Sung's Korea shining with the Juche era with the great victory of socialism of Korean style.

articles.title: Korean People Turn out in March for New Revolutionary Upsurge
articles.content:
Korean People Turn out in March for New Revolutionary Upsurge
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean people who have entered the march of the new year are waging a vigorous campaign to make a historic leap in all sectors of the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					The hearts of the working class and the agricultural working people are beating violently in the raging flames of the new revolutionary upsurge kindled by General Secretary Kim Jong Il when he visited the workers of Kangson.
					
					Having tested the greatness of their strength in the practical activities last year, the workers of Kangson are working miracles in iron and steel production from the first days of the new year, bracing themselves up.
					
					 Power production bases including the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex are mustering all forces available to reduce coal unloading and wagon stopping time while raising the scientific and technical efficiency of boilers to the maximum so that all the factories of the country may be kept in full-capacity operation and people may benefit more by electricity.
					
					 The workers of the Musan Mining Complex displayed in a blast of 150,000 cubic meters of earth on the first day of the new year their unshakable faith and will to record heroic feats from day to day in the general march of the Songun revolution in the same spirit and fortitude with which the great Chollima upsurge was brought about in the postwar period under the militant slogan "Charge at the Speed of Chollima!" 
					
					 Agricultural working people in charge of the nation's granaries are reporting innovative achievements every day in farming preparations of the new year, transporting quantities of compost to the paddy and non-paddy fields, with an unusual determination to solve the food problem at any cost by their own efforts.
					
					Now the working people across the country, keeping in mind the militant calls put forward in the joint editorial this year, are filled with a single purpose in mind to display the advantages of the socialist self-supporting economy to the full by making a great innovation and a great leap never known in the nation's history with a general advance of Chollima.

articles.title: Group of Traitors in S. Korea Bound to Face Stern Judgment of History
articles.content:
Group of Traitors in S. Korea Bound to Face Stern Judgment of History
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Grand National Party of south Korea is the main anti-reunification force standing in the way of the advance of the era of independent reunification as it is a shock brigade for traitor Lee Myung Bak's moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. It is, therefore, one of the important tasks facing the Korean nation to smash its moves.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The GNP has become the root cause of all sufferings and misfortune as it has committed indelible crimes against the country and nation by succeeding to the sycophantic, treacherous and anti-reunification policy of the successive fascist rulers.
					
					It is the worst crime committed by the GNP last year that it drove the north-south relations to a catastrophic crisis by negating the historic north-south joint declarations and hamstringing the efforts to implement them.
					
					It is also an unpardonable crime that it adopted the ignition of a war of aggression against the north as a policy and worked hard to impose a nuclear war disaster upon the nation.
					
					By nature, the GNP gentries are a group of traitors who do not hesitate to sell off the interests of the nation for the sake of their personal fame and success and selfish interests in utter disregard of the country, the nation and reunification and a group of nasty political charlatans greedy for power and chief culprits of irregularities and corruption.
					
					It is not hard to guess what disastrous consequences the south Koreans will suffer again in the future if they fail to put an end to the misrule of the GNP and bring the group of traitors to justice of history.
					
					The above-said treacherous party should be disbanded and its gentries be forced to stand the people's trial.
					
					Only a stern judgment of history will await the above-said party as it has done only things harmful to the country and the nation.

articles.title: DPRK Reiterates Its Will to Contribute to Cause of Global Independence
articles.content:
DPRK Reiterates Its Will to Contribute to Cause of Global Independence
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent stand and will of the DPRK to strive hard to achieve global independence.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government have pursued their foreign policy the idea of which is independence, peace and friendship, thus developing the friendly and cooperative relations with various countries of the world, raising its international prestige of the country, boosting the international solidarity with the Korean revolution and greatly contributing to the cause of global independence.
					
					The DPRK has maintained the revolutionary stand of approaching and settling everything its own way from the steadfast stand of Juche and on the principle of independence despite whatever difficulties and ordeals in the way of the Korean revolution for a long period.
					
					The DPRK has developed the relations with other countries in its field of external activities on the principle of complete equality, mutual respect and non-interference in the internal affairs of other countries. It has always independently solved all issues arising in external relations in line with its own judgment and decision, proceeding from the interests of the Korean revolution.
					
					The article recalls that the DPRK has greatly contributed to defending the peace and security of the world and the Korean people fully supported the world progressive people in their struggle to defend their sovereignty from domination and subjugation.
					
					The imperialist aggression forces' policy of war and their moves for domination are the greatest obstacle lying in the way of achieving global independence in the present century, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The reality requires progressive mankind to intensify the struggle for achieving the cause of global independence.
					
					The WPK and the DPRK government will dynamically advance to achieve the cause of global independence under the uplifted banner of Songun, keenly aware of their historic missions and responsibilities in the future, too.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Unjust Educational Policy under Fire
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Unjust Educational Policy under Fire
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) made public a statement on Jan. 2 blasting the unjust educational policy of the puppet authorities.
					The statement referred to the fact that Lee Myung Bak in his "speech on the state administration" talked about "uninterrupted educational reform", adding that this, in the final analysis, brought to light the intention of the Lee "government" to persistently pursue its unjust educational policy including "campus autonomy" and the "system of sizing up teachers".
					
					It strongly demanded the Lee "government" make a total switchover in its unjust educational policy which brings a heavy burden to the people in the grip of the worst economic crisis to help them realize their hope in the field of education at least.

articles.title: 2nd 48-Hour People's Emergency Action Declared in Seoul
articles.content:
2nd 48-Hour People's Emergency Action Declared in Seoul
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The People's Emergency Action to Defend Democracy and Check Suppression of Candlelight Struggle made up of at least 100 civic and public organizations in south Korea held an emergency meeting of its executive members on Jan. 4 at which it declared the start of the second "48-hour people's emergency action to check Lee Myung Bak's moves to railroad evil bills."
					The organization said that the situation prevailing in the "National Assembly" at present calls on the organization to turn out once again in the struggle for checking Lee's dictatorship.
					
					The struggle will be kicked off by an emergency meeting on the situation to defend democracy and check Lee's dictatorship on Jan. 6 and will last till Jan. 8, the organization said, adding that it would pressurize the Lee regime and the "Grand National Party" keen to railroad evil bills through the NA by staging positive joint actions such as sit-in strike, candlelight rally, press conference and inter-sector meetings in front of the NA in that period.
					
					Speakers at a press conference held prior to the meeting stated that the Lee "government" is taking the road of dictatorship, demanding the NA close its gate as it sides with the treacherous regime.
					
					They warned that even if the GNP rams Lee's evil bills through the NA by taking advantage of its majority in the NA, the people will never recognize them but offer strong resistance against them.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Holidays to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Holidays to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- A Moscow, Russia, preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and celebrating February 16 was formed on Dec. 30 last year.
					The committee was made up of 23 personages of various circles including Oleg Shenin, chairman of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, and Dmitri Yazov, former defence minister of the Soviet Union, with Vladimir Tolstikov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, as its chairman.
					
					The committee decided to hold colorful events such as commemoration and celebration meeting, meeting to remember President Kim Il Sung, symposium on exploits performed by the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photo exhibition on the occasions of the significant Day of the Sun and the February holiday.

articles.title: Information Bulletin Issued in Britain
articles.content:
Information Bulletin Issued in Britain
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued an information bulletin to mark the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					The bulletin carried articles under various titles with the photos of the three generals of Mt. Paektu.
					
					The bulletin in an article titled "The supreme commander enjoys people's boundless reverence" said that Kim Jong Il has trained the KPA into the army of the leader and party and matchless invincible army that has inherited the tradition of Mt. Paektu demonstrating its dignity as a-match-for-a hundred army with his energetic Songun leadership, adding that socialist Korea exists thanks to the great brilliant commander.
					
					The bulletin in an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Suk lives in the hearts of humankind" said that her revolutionary life was the glorious one of a great revolutionary and a great mother who performed great feats to shine long in history by holding President Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun of the nation and dedicating her all to the struggle for carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					The bulletin said that her revolutionary history and struggle exploits were given wide publicity by publications of organizations of friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Songun politics in different countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Om Yong Chun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Om Yong Chun
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il envio el dia 6 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la difunta Om Yong Chun, Actora del Pueblo y jefa de seccion del Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Sobre elecciones de diputados a la XII Legislatura de APS de la RPDC
articles.content:
Sobre elecciones de diputados a la XII Legislatura de APS de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ATCC) -- Quedo publicada el dia 6 la resolucion del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema (APS) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre la realizacion de las elecciones de los diputados a la APS.
					Segun el documento, tendran lugar el 8 de marzo del 98 (2009) de la Era Juche las elecciones de los diputados a la XII Legislatura de la APS de acuerdo con el articulo 90 de la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC.

articles.title: ATCC condena la operacion genocida de Israel contra Palestina
articles.content:
ATCC condena la operacion genocida de Israel contra Palestina
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ATCC) -- Pese a la fuerte protesta y denuncia de la sociedad internacional, Israel sigue ampliando su barbaro ataque armado contra la franja de Gaza de Palestina.
					Esta operacion iniciada con el ataque aereo del 27 de diciembre del ano pasado, en que fueron movilizados mas de 60 cazas y helicopteros armados, dio paso a la invasion terrestre al cabo de 8 dias de bombardeo.
					
					El dia 3 por la noche, las tropas terrestres israelies equivalentes a 3 brigadas incluyendo los tanques y la infanteria invadieron varias zonas de la franja de Gaza y cometieron la ensangrentada operacion de matanza y destruccion.
					
					Hasta el dia 4, por el indiscriminado bombardeo y canoneo del ejercito israeli, resultaron muertos 514 palestinos y heridos mas de 2 mil 600 y se redujeron a escombros muchos establecimientos publicos y edificios de Gaza.
					
					El portavoz del ejercito israeli argumento que el objetivo de esta operacion es destruir la infraestructura de HAMAS, organizacion politico-militar de Palestina que controla la franja de Gaza.
					
					La aventura belica de Israel, que desde el comienzo del ano nuevo, amplia sus acciones militares de lesa humanidad contra los palestinos bajo el pretexto del "antiterrorismo", produce en el ambito mundial la indignacion y condena a este pais sionista y EE.UU.
					
					Los paises arabes e islamicos demandan fuertemente a Israel el cese inmediato de esa operacion militar que causa desastres humanitarios en Gaza, senalando que ella deviene el ataque contra las ciudades de todos los paises arabes, siendo el acto criminal para llevar al fracaso total el proceso de paz del Medio Oriente.
					
					Ademas de esta area, se escenifican en estos dias en todas las regiones del mundo incluyendo Asia, Europa y America Latina las manifestaciones y mitines de condena a la agresion israeli y la injusta politica de EE.UU. sobre el Medio Oriente.
					
					Condenando el ataque israeli contra Gaza, el presidente boliviano demando al gobierno norteamericano dejar de imponer sus politicas agresivas en el Medio Oriente.
					
					Continuo que lo que hace el imperialismo norteamericano por medio de Israel es esa criminal invasion sobre las ciudades palestinas.
					
					Asevero que Israel debe cambiar sus politicas y el gobierno estadounidense ha de dejar de usar a los paises como Israel para invadir a los paises que estan buscando su liberacion.
					
					Senalo que la matanza no es la solucion del nuevo milenio e Israel no debe seguir siendo un aparato del imperialismo norteamericano para humillar al pueblo palestino.
					
					Es sumamente justa tal voz de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. ampara la matanza del pais hebreo diciendo que este tiene el "derecho a la autodefensa" y HAMAS es una "organizacion terrorista".
					
					En la entrevista concedida el dia 4 con una cadena radioemisora, el vicepresidente norteamericano Cheney dijo que es insuficiente la operacion de ataque aereo sobre la franja de Gaza y hasta califico de correcta la decision de Israel de lanzar la invasion terrestre.
					
					Ya en septiembre del ano pasado, EE.UU. aprobo la venta a Israel de mil bombas "GBU-39", que fueron arribadas al pais sionista a principios de diciembre en visperas del bombardeo y se usaron como principal medio de golpe en esta operacion aerea que resulto la primera etapa de la presente invasion contra Palestina.
					
					Gracias al amparo del imperio, Israel endurecio el ano pasado el bloqueo contra la franja de Gaza y asesino el 4 de noviembre a los militantes de HAMAS obligando a esta reanudar el lanzamiento de proyectiles-cohete y morteros contra la zona septentrional de Israel. Como resultado, fue rota completamente la tregua entre HAMAS e Israel que se mantenia nominalmente desde junio de 2008.
					
					Esto fue aprovechado por el pais hebreo como pretexto para realizar su plan de ataque militar de gran envergadura contra la franja de Gaza.
					
					A traves de esta operacion, Israel y EE.UU. persiguen varios objetivos politicos y militares.
					
					Tendran lugar el 10 de febrero las elecciones generales en Israel.
					
					Debido al escandalo de corrupcion del premier, el partido gobernante Kadima se halla en el desorden y sufre la caida del porcentaje de apoyo.
					
					Por eso, las autoridades israelies se vieron en la necesidad de lanzar esa aventura militar contra palestinos para salir de la crisis en que cayo su partido y ganar mas "popularidad".
					
					Desde el punto de vista militar, ellas tratan de aprovecharla como importante chance para reparar su derrota en la guerra con el Libano de 2006.
					
					Se puede decir que la operacion militar israeli es la segunda guerra que la actual administracion norteamericana provoco en 8 anos de su mandato en el Medio Oriente a traves de sus titeres sionistas.
					
					La administracion Bush fracaso en su intento de convertir el proceso de paz del Medio Oriente en el de "guerra antiterrorista" para establecer en esta area el orden de dominio monopolista de EE.UU. aunque recurrio a las intrigas de toda indole.
					
					A fin de disimular el fracaso de su politica sobre el Medio Oriente, el imperio defiende acaloradamente su "guerra antiterrorista" llamando la atencion mundial al "terrorismo" de HAMAS.
					
					No es casual que EE.UU. justificara el ataque militar a HAMAS calificandola de "organizacion terrorista" en desafio a la opinion publica internacional que condena ese acto anti-etico de Israel.
					
					La agresiva y dominacionista politica de Israel y EE.UU. sobre el Medio Oriente, que toma como victima de su estrategia politica a los palestinos y el proceso de paz de esta region, no dara otro resultado que el aislamiento de si mismos en la arena mundial.

articles.title: "GPN" esta condenado a la bancarrota, sentencia Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"GPN" esta condenado a la bancarrota, sentencia Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual publicado este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun definio como una de las importantes tareas de lucha de la nacion coreana frustrar las maniobras del "Gran Partido Nacional" del Sur de Corea.
					Esta horda de peores opositores a la reunificacion frena perseverantemente el avance de la epoca de reunificacion independiente siendo la vanguardia en la campana de confrontacion con la RPDC lanzada por el traidor Lee Myung Bak, precisa el articulista y prosigue:
					
					El "GPN" es la causa de todos los sufrimientos y desgracias porque esta abultando el expediente de sus graves crimenes contra el pais y la nacion dando continuidad a la politica servil a las grandes potencias, vendepatria, antinacional y anti-reunificacion de los anteriores gobernantes fascistas.
					
					El peor crimen cometido el ano pasado por ese partido traidor es haber llevado las relaciones Norte-Sur a la crisis catastrofica al negar las historicas declaraciones conjuntas N-S y obstaculizar su implementacion.
					
					Otro crimen imperdonable es que trata de imponer los desastres de guerra nuclear a la nacion formulando como su politica la provocacion de la guerra de agresion al Norte.
					
					Desde el principio, el "GPN" fue integrado por los traidores, que venden sin vacilacion alguna los intereses nacionales para satisfacer su ambicion arribista, deseo de ganar notoriedad y sus intereses egoistas sin tomar en consideracion el destino del pais y la nacion ni la reunificacion de la patria, y por los sucios estafadores politicos y peores corruptos que estan enloquecidos por el poder.
					
					Si no pone punto final a la gobernacion antipopular de ese partido traidor y no lo saca al tribunal de la historia, la nacion coreana sufrira otros desastres terribles.
					
					El "GPN" debe ser desmantelado y sus miembros tienen que ser condenados a la severa sentencia por el pueblo y la historia.
